<ce:section-title>Preparation of {[Cd(hmph)(4-bpmp)<ce:inf loc="post">1.5</ce:inf>]·4H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O}<ce:italic>
<ce:inf loc="post">n</ce:inf>
</ce:italic> (<ce:bold>1</ce:bold>)</ce:section-title><ce:para id="p0030" view="all">Cd(ClO<ce:inf loc="post">4</ce:inf>)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>·6H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O (75<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mg, 0.18<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol), homophthalic acid (32<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mg, 0.18<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol), 4-bpmp (99<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mg, 0.37<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol), and 5<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mL deionized water were placed into a 15<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mL screw-cap vial. The vial was sealed and heated in an oil bath at 80<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>°C for 72<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>h, and then cooled slowly to 25<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>°C. Colorless blocks of <ce:bold>1</ce:bold> (63<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mg, 46% yield based on Cd) were isolated after washing with distilled water, ethanol, and acetone and drying in air. <ce:italic>Anal.</ce:italic> Calc. for C<ce:inf loc="post">33</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">44</ce:inf>CdN<ce:inf loc="post">6</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">8</ce:inf>
<ce:bold>1</ce:bold>: C, 51.80; H, 5.80; N, 10.98. Found: C, 51.44; H, 5.61; N, 10.58%. IR (cm<ce:sup loc="post">−1</ce:sup>): 3298 (w, br), 3065 (w), 2925 (w), 2803 (w), 1608 (m), 1586 (m), 1561 (s), 1550 (s), 1501 (w), 1446 (w), 1424 (m), 1411 (m), 1383 (s), 1352 (m), 1321 (m), 1297 (m), 1269 (w), 1230 (w), 1161 (w), 1131 (m), 1062 (w), 1047 (w), 1012 (m), 971 (w), 924 (w), 845 (m), 829 (m), 801 (m), 765 (w), 729 (s), 690 (m), 670 (m).</ce:para><ce:section-title>Preparation of [Cd<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>(hmph)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>(4-bpfp)]<ce:italic>

</ce:italic> (<ce:bold>2</ce:bold>)</ce:section-title><ce:para id="p0035" view="all">Cd(NO<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>)<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>·4H<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O (30<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mg, 0.097<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol), homophthalic acid (18<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mg, 0.098<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol), 4-bpfp (29<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mg, 0.098<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol), 0.5<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mL of 1.0<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>M NaOH solution and 7<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mL deionized water were placed into a 23<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mL Teflon-lined acid digestion bomb. The bomb was sealed and heated in an oven at 120<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>°C for 46<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>h, and then cooled slowly to 25<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>°C. Colorless blocks of <ce:bold>2</ce:bold> (7<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mg, 16% yield based on Cd) were isolated after washing with distilled water, ethanol, and acetone and drying in air. <ce:italic>Anal.</ce:italic> Calc. for C<ce:inf loc="post">34</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">28</ce:inf>Cd<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>N<ce:inf loc="post">4</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">10</ce:inf>
<ce:bold>2</ce:bold>: C, 46.54; H, 3.22; N, 6.39. Found: C, 46.41; H, 3.05; N, 6.31%. Colorless blocks of <ce:bold>3</ce:bold> (51<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mg, 69% yield based on Zn) were isolated after washing with distilled water, ethanol, and acetone and drying in air. <ce:italic>Anal.</ce:italic> Calc. for C<ce:inf loc="post">36</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">40</ce:inf>N<ce:inf loc="post">4</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">10</ce:inf>Zn<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>

clean_text:
Preparation of {[Cd(hmph)(4-bpmp)1.5]⋅4H2O} n  (1)

Cd(ClO4)2⋅6H2O (75mg, 0.18mmol), homophthalic acid (32mg, 0.18mmol), 4-bpmp (99mg, 0.37mmol), and 5mL deionized water were placed into a 15mL screw-cap vial. The vial was sealed and heated in an oil bath at 80°C for 72h, and then cooled slowly to 25°C. Colorless blocks of 1 (63mg, 46% yield based on Cd) were isolated after washing with distilled water, ethanol, and acetone and drying in air. Anal. Calc. for C33H44CdN6O8 1: C, 51.80; H, 5.80; N, 10.98. Found: C, 51.44; H, 5.61; N, 10.58%. IR (cm-1): 3298 (w, br), 3065 (w), 2925 (w), 2803 (w), 1608 (m), 1586 (m), 1561 (s), 1550 (s), 1501 (w), 1446 (w), 1424 (m), 1411 (m), 1383 (s), 1352 (m), 1321 (m), 1297 (m), 1269 (w), 1230 (w), 1161 (w), 1131 (m), 1062 (w), 1047 (w), 1012 (m), 971 (w), 924 (w), 845 (m), 829 (m), 801 (m), 765 (w), 729 (s), 690 (m), 670 (m).

Preparation of [Cd2(hmph)2(4-bpfp)] n  (2)

Cd(NO3)2⋅4H2O (30mg, 0.097mmol), homophthalic acid (18mg, 0.098mmol), 4-bpfp (29mg, 0.098mmol), 0.5mL of 1.0M NaOH solution and 7mL deionized water were placed into a 23mL Teflon-lined acid digestion bomb. The bomb was sealed and heated in an oven at 120°C for 46h, and then cooled slowly to 25°C. Colorless blocks of 2 (7mg, 16% yield based on Cd) were isolated after washing with distilled water, ethanol, and acetone and drying in air. Anal. Calc. for C34H28Cd2N4O10 2: C, 46.54; H, 3.22; N, 6.39. Found: C, 46.41; H, 3.05; N, 6.31%. IR (cm-1): 3260 (w), 3069 (w), 2863 (w), 1638 (s), 1614 (w), 1587 (s), 1570 (s), 1527 (s), 1459 (w), 1434 (s), 1395 (s), 1359 (m), 1323 (m), 1280 (s), 1252 (s), 1225 (w), 1196 (w), 1170 (w), 1148 (w), 1088 (w), 1068 (w), 1036 (w), 1021 (w), 1009 (s), 954 (w), 903 (w), 884 (w), 864 (w), 838 (s), 826 (w), 800 (w), 776 (w), 752 (s), 732 (w), 720 (s), 698 (s), 665 (s).

Preparation of [Zn2(1,2-phda)2(4-bpmp)(H2O)2] n  (3)

Zn(ClO4)2⋅6H2O (68mg, 0.18mmol), 1,2-phenylenediacetic acid (35mg, 0.18mmol), 4-bpmp (99mg, 0.37mmol), and 5mL deionized water were placed into a 15mL screw-cap vial. The vial was sealed and heated in an oil bath at 80°C for 72h, and then cooled slowly to 25°C. Colorless blocks of 3 (51mg, 69% yield based on Zn) were isolated after washing with distilled water, ethanol, and acetone and drying in air. Anal. Calc. for C36H40N4O10Zn2 3: C, 52.76; H, 4.92; N, 6.84. Found: C, 52.41; H, 4.51; N, 6.75%. IR (cm-1): 3200 (w, br), 2937 (w), 2816 (w), 1609 (m), 1605 (m), 1553 (s), 1504 (w), 1429 (m), 1391 (s), 1320 (w), 1300 (m), 1222 (w), 1164 (w), 1132 (w), 1097 (w), 1062 (w), 1026 (w), 1012 (w), 928 (w), 870 (w), 845 (m), 833 (m), 807 (w), 744 (w), 705 (s).

Preparation of [Zn2(hmph)2(4-bpfp)] n  (4)

Zn(NO3)2⋅6H2O (29mg, 0.097mmol), homophthalic acid (18mg, 0.097mmol), 4-bpfp (29mg, 0.097mmol), 0.5mL of 1.0M NaOH solution and 7mL deionized water were placed into a 23mL Teflon-lined acid digestion bomb. The bomb was sealed and heated in an oven at 120°C for 46h, and then cooled slowly to 25°C. Colorless blocks of 4 (18mg, 47% yield based on Zn) were isolated after washing with distilled water, ethanol, and acetone and drying in air. Anal. Calc. for C34H28N4O10Zn2 4: C, 52.13; H, 3.60; N, 7.15. Found: C, 51.86; H, 3.42; N, 7.03%. IR (cm-1): 3275 (w), 3093 (w), 2923 (w), 2860 (w), 1635 (s), 1615 (s), 1601 (s), 1577 (s), 1547 (w), 1524 (w), 1501 (w), 1402 (s), 1388 (s), 1286 (s), 1250 (s), 1176 (w), 1152 (w), 1093 (w), 1060 (w), 1032 (w), 994 (s), 955 (w), 927 (w), 904 (w), 884 (w), 864 (w), 838 (s), 824 (s), 756 (w), 724 (s), 703 (s), 686 (s), 674 (s), 662 (w).
